about_the_game:
Fight under the eternal shade of the Sunless Isle! Pick three fighters to assist each other and improve during the fight!
This game has simple controls with two buttons (physical and magical attacks) and grounded combat, where every move counts! If the opponent is too strong, level up and upgrade or unlock new attacks to turn the tables!

Fight in local multiplayer or against the AI! Online multiplayer is scheduled to be added at a later date.

Characters


Pick three fighters to make your team, and switch between them at will!

  • Aster (Wanderer): A vagabond roaming the desert. His gunblade enables an explosive close-range style of combat.
  • Eremia (Dragoon): An elf guard out to see the world. She has a defensive spear-fighting style that incorporates faster aerial attacks.
  • Caroline (Mage): A young mage out to fill a prophecy. She has varied spells, from healing to beams.
  • William (Pirate): A skeleton reanimated. Proficient in martial arts, he can sacrifice health for longer chains.
  • Daphne (Knight): A dryad grown inside an armor. Her defense is second to none, and she can close in relentlessly.

And 4 guest characters are also joining the fight!

Mechanics


  • Simple Controls! With only two buttons for your attacks and no complex joystick motions, you can get directly into the fight! Manage your mana to make strong magic attacks, and call upon your allies to help create openings in fights!
  • Level up! Acquire experience and increase your level during fights! Increase your base stats, and unlock new passives to win!
  • Upgrade! Each of your magical skills can be upgraded during the fight! Either make it better, or change it for a new attack. Adapt and vanquish!
  • Assists! You're not alone! Call upon your allies to cover you using their magical skills and seize victory!

Additional info: this game was made with Castagne, a FOSS framework for making fighting games! This game's source code will also be available as an example project.

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Broadwell I7-5700HQ
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M DDR3 2 Go
  • Additional Notes: This is the lowest I've tried it on yet, but I think you can run it on potatoes.
